name: Send a Discord Message When an Infinite Options Product is Purchased
description: Send a Discord message when an Infinite Options product with the option "Special_Notes" is purchased. This template is handy for companies using Discord; your team will receive notifications when a product requires special handling (ex. gift wrapping, professional install, etc.)
readme:
## Setup

- In the `Infinite Options Order Created Action`, specify the field name of the Infinite Options field that should trigger slack notification. By default we use the Label cart "Special". For information on how to locate the field name in Infinite Options, [check out our documentation](https://docs.theshoppad.com/article/122-why-are-option-selections-labeled-infiniteoptions1).
